website_summaries.verdict: The Quirky Pickup power combines a surge protector and portable battery simply for the sake of offering something new. Nothing is added by the combination to justify the premium that you'll pay for it.
pros: The Quirky Pickup Power comes with a surge protector and a portable battery that can charge your smartphone on the go
It's cleverly designed with helpful LEDs and enough capacity to carry two charges for most phones
cons: With only 6,000mAh of battery charging power and three outlets in the surge protector, you can find better options individually for less

customer_reviews.title: Very very handy.
customer_reviews.text: A must for the on the go person. The battery charges pretty quick and lasts a good while, (I've watched several movies on one charge.)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad description
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four stars because the description wasn’t completely clear. I wanted a portable AC outlet that I can charge and stick on my kitchen island so I can use small appliances but this is AC outlets with a portable charger that pops out of it. If I were looking for a power strip with a portable battery that takes USB I’d totally buy this product. I just needed something a little different!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Picture misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading!! I bought 4 of these for a party thinking they were wireless power strips but the wireless is for a USB not an actual plug! So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Read description fully before ordering - I was under the impression this was a battery powered outlet and come to find out it still has to be plugged into a wall outlet...only battery powered anything is the powerbank attached.
customer_reviews.author: Mama James

customer_reviews.title: the product came in perfect condition, no scratches or anything and I'm so ...
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is with the way the outlets face since I have a set of lights/light timer attached to it and using them blocks access to the adjacent outlet so I can actually only use 2/3. Other than that, the product came in perfect condition, no scratches or anything and I'm so excited to have a decent powerbank for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. The battery works great and charges fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L.

customer_reviews.title: But it is a nice product otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Only downfall (for me) is the size. It is quiet large; would be a little tough to travel with. But it is a nice product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Pack Problems
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack is hard to get in and out and also doesn't work with most usb cables. I needed it to charge an iPhone but my cables usually didn't work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for what you get
customer_reviews.text: This is really clunky in a way that the pictures don't reveal. It's really oversized, for no apparent reason. The rectangular battery pack is eager to pop out whenever you touch the powerstrip. Expect only a little "top off" if you need to charge your phone with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shedwick

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient but...bank not replaceable
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the convenience of this power bank and strip. It worked great for almost a year until someone stole my purse, which had the power bank inside. I have found no way to obtain a replacement power bank for this item. So now I only have the surge protector strip.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine from the container store. Love it because it's compact and easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martinez

product_meta.title: Quirky PPUP1-40WH Pickup Power 4000mAh
product_meta.description: Color:WhitePickup Power is a desktop power strip with three AC outlets and 1080 joules of surge protection. But the best part? It's got a portable battery you can pop out and take with you in a pinch. Snag it with a 4000 or 6000mAH battery to charge e-readers, tablets, phones, cameras, and more from anywhere. Instead of cursing the heavens next time your mobile device runs out of juice, just pick up your power and go.
feature_bullets: tabletop power strip with portable battery
desktop power strip with three AC outlets and 1080 joules of surge protection
one high-powered 2.1A USB port and 4000mAh of juice

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
